author: USA TODAY, Phil Galewitz, Kaiser Health News
title: Florida has not issued a statewide stay-at-home order amid coronavirus crisis. Some support Gov. Ron DeSantis' approach. Others don't.
description: Florida, one of the eight states with the most COVID-19 cases, is the only one in that group that hasn't issued a statewide stay-at-home order.
content:
Spring breakers, ignoring health guidelines, are forcing more and more cities to close beaches around Florida.
Accuweather
JUPITER, Fla. Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis has refused to issue a statewide stay-at-home order to stem the spread of the novel coronaviru… [+7753 chars]
